question: Which nation administers the "Tans-Karakoram Tract"?
explanation: Trans-Karakoram Tract is under the administration of the People's Republic of China as a part of the Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region. It is also known as Shaksgam Valley or Shaksgam Tract. However, this tract was claimed by Pakistan as part of the Kashmir and also claimed by India as part of the Union Territory of Ladakh.
